game_description: 18+ Use of Alcohol/Tobacco, Simulated Gambling Users Interact, In-Game Purchases PokerStars VR brings you a free-to-play virtual reality casino that truly has no limits. Step into the future with this game-changing release from one of the biggest names in the business. Challenge friends and players from around the world in electrifying games of poker, blackjack, roulette, slots and craps. Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, chat in real time, handle your chips and cards, just as you would in the real world. Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant. A trip to the casino will never be the same again. Are you in? Also featuring Quest Pro support with face and eye tracking, advanced haptics, and mixed reality passthrough! Please note that we will no longer offer support for Quest 1, effective October 18, 2023. Thank you for your understanding and we hope we‚Äôll continue to welcome you to the tables. - Key Features ‚Äì - Authentic poker, blackjack, roulette, slots & craps action - A fully immersive, social experience - Simple, intuitive, easy to play - Play real opponents - Realistic physics - Unlock free chips every day - Certified RNG - Stunning playing environments Access to IAP may be restricted by location PokerStars VR VOIP is monitored by ToxMod
Genres: Casino & Poker, Casual, Mixed Reality, Social
review_1: At first, it was to learn the game. Now, the game haunts me. It's in my dreams and follows me everywhere I go. I can't get away from it. But I spent years understanding the game, and I have even gotten better at the game. I now know that this game is not only a challenge but is also an escape.
review_2: Game Runs good. Best poker game out there by far. This beats any other online poker game in terms of fun and enjoyment. Some people take this game very seriously and others dont know whats going on. There is plenty of cool items to get as you play, giving you things to play with as you play poker. Really well done game for being free. I've seen people climb up and get rich without spending a dime. I've seen people spending money on the game but they seem to enjoy doing so. At the end of the day you cant cash out and it was just a game. but this game makes not cashing out still seem fun. Recommend
